articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: After Putin Blames West For War, Biden Says Ukraine Will 'Never Be Victory For Russia' - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden used a speech in the Polish capital on February 21 to reiterate "unwavering" support for neighboring Ukraine in its war with Russia and NATO resolve, hours after President Vladimir Putin sought to justify Russia's unprovoked invasion.

articles.title: China and Europe team up on tests before joint space mission in 2025 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: It marks first time a satellite made in China is shipped to European Space Agency, and for a Chinese team to help assemble and test at an ESA facility.
